title: This represents Zhang Wei, not Zhuge Liang~

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Warring Kingdoms Azir with ingame gameplay! Price: 1350RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as Warring Kingdoms Azir, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
1.  He fights with a spear as his main weapon.
2.  He does have the fan, but only as a memento of his teacher.  He never brought it to the battlefield.
3.  The command of the army passed to Zhang Wei when Zhuge Liang passed, so it still fits for him to be a commander.

I do gotta give props, though.  The skin team knew what they were doing when making this skin.
Now I'll patiently wait for a champion to come out that best fits Zhuge Liang's archteype for a skin to properly represent him.
